alert.note: Alert for Brown; Eastern Cherry; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cherry, northwestern Brown and western Keya Paha Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Millboro to 6 miles southwest of Norden. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Very heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norden and North River Trail. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 26 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
